description: Warning - Warns the user that his browser does not support the image upload
defaultMessage: Oops nope ... looks like you're browser is even older than we thought. Sorry, you'll have to switch to a more modern browser to continue.

Hmm, looks like you are using an old browser (or a not so old Internet Explorer). This site will work on your browser BUT IT'S SOO MUCH MORE FUN if you switch to a modern browser, plus you can navegate the coasts of this world. Chrome, Firefox or Safari are safe choices, especially if updated to the latest versions.
